background: Oversees Kan 11’s documentary output, focusing on bold, access-driven and author-led films that explore Israeli society, politics, history and culture, with openness to international co-productions.
thematic_priorities: History with political or cultural resonance
target_audience: Israeli public seeking cultural, political and social documentaries
budget_parameters: · Range: ₪80K–₪400K per hour · Higher budgets possible for co-productions
current_calls: Docs on contemporary Israeli society and identity
History and diaspora-focused projects with unique access
submission_process: One-page proposal with subject, structure and relevance
name: Orna Ben Dor
